NY/SF - Venmo is hiring a Senior Android Engineer to join our team and continue to develop the leading mobile payments app in the Google Play store. Ideal candidates have spent a couple years working with the Android platform and mobile development as a whole, have good testing experience, and have thoughtful answers to what makes good mobile engineering and what makes Android unique compared to other mobile frameworks.

Apply in NYC - http://hire.jobvite.com/CompanyJobs/Careers.aspx?k=Job&c=qoj... Apply for SF - http://hire.jobvite.com/CompanyJobs/Careers.aspx?k=Job&c=qoj...

Questions? Email me (one of our Android engineers) -ron@venmo.com

For a full list of our openings at Venmo, check out https://venmo.com/info/jobs
